Yesbomb.com

An idea dissemination and feedback platform

It's either a hell yes or a hell no

I send out a link to my homies that only works once. After the initial click, the link expires and you can never use it again. They go through this form and qualify to check out my ideas.

If they've been here before, no need to go throught the heavy vetting process. Start where asking them if they have the same problem as me.

Instructions

Use your time wisely and read everything carefully.

Will you sign an NDA?

First thing's first, let's verify your identity.

Is it really you? Let's see your ID. (verified, go NDA. otherwise, eat a fat one.)

NDA

You will never speak of this to anyone besides those named in this agreement, etc. Agreed?

Let's get down to business. Do you have the same problem as me?

Have you ever wanted to make something for your home or yard and gave up?

Did you give up because you didn't know how to design or build it?

Did you give up because you didn't have or want to purchase the tools to design or build it?

I have an idea that might help with that.

Would you be willing to give me some feedback?

I made a prototype

Would you like to try it out?

should be in a URL param, referenced by an id or directly
